headline: Amgen (AMGN) Completes US$60,594 Million Share Buyback After 14 Years
summary: Amgen (AMGN) recently concluded a buyback period without repurchasing any shares, maintaining its focus on prior buyback strategies. The company's positive earnings announcement highlighted robust year-over-year growth, potentially contributing to its stock price increase of 4.6% over the last quarter. Despite legal issues impacting the broader perception of companies engaged in antitrust activities, Amgen’s legal challenges might have countered market trends. Additionally, ongoing product...
